name: Helm of the Alabaster Unicorn
effect:
:instant: Return 1 [:spellpower:](../spells/index.md) of your choice from your discard pile to your hand.

— OR —

:instant: Cast a [spell](../spells/index.md) from the top of the [:spellpower:](../spells/index.md) deck discard pile and Remove this card.
flavor_text: A traveling tinker in need of supplies offers your a helm with a unicorn's horn on its top in exchange for food and water. You accept, and later find out that the helm is magical.
